unnormalised: Arre yaar, this online payment scene is confusing! Paid ₹2500 for a saree on Myntra, but my bank statement shows Rs 2,500.00 debited. Also, the cashback of ₹100 hasn't been credited yet. Called customer care, they said wait for 24 hrs. Hopefully, it gets sorted!
normalised: Arre yaar, this online payment scene is confusing! Paid rupee two thousand five hundred for a saree on Myntra, but my bank statement shows rupees two thousand five hundred debited. Also, the cashback of rupee one hundred hasn't been credited yet. Called customer care, they said wait for twenty four hours. Hopefully, it gets sorted!
